item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1450; 09:25PM; 740 E 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/32yRamN; Green Meadows; It took 34 firefighters 28 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames from an outside fire extending in, which damaged several residential structures. No reported injuries. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM22 E11 E203 E215 E233 E264 E33 E5 E57 E64 E65 EM13 HR3 RA33 RA64 RA833 T15 T3 T33 T64 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1450; 08:57PM; 740 E 108th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/32yRamN; Green Meadows; Outside fire extending in to several structures. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM22 E11 E203 E215 E233 E264 E33 E5 E57 E64 E65 EM13 HR3 RA33 RA64 RA833 T15 T3 T33 T64 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#1041; 03:55PM; 19601 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DZQHYT; Pacific Palisades; One 69-year-old male was found in fair condition, requesting medical assistance, as well as assistance returning from his remote location. LAFD Air Operations safely hoisted the patient and transported to an area hospital. ; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC10 E109 E273 E90 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA93 RH114 T73; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Fire; INC#0235; 06:40AM; 12269 W Montague St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2lLts; Pacoima; The first arriving 45 firefighters took 72 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames involving vehicles (including at least two RVs), vegetation, and one residential structure. Firefighters prevented damage to a nearby commercial building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 AR33 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM42 E24 E260 E275 E289 E290 E298 E7 E77 E89 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 PH1 RA889 RA89 RA898 RA98 T60 T75 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Fire; INC#0235; 05:28AM; 12269 W Montague St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I2lLts; Pacoima; PRELIM: Fire involving vehicles (including motorhomes?) that extended to involve propane tanks and vegetation, to involve a home and threaten a commercial building.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 CM42 E24 E260 E275 E289 E290 E298 E7 E77 E89 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA889 RA89 RA898 RA98 T60 T75 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Pedestrian Struck; INC#1344; 07:35PM; 2141 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3regeK0; Harvard Heights; PRELIM: 1 person (unknown age / gender / affiliation / circumstances) deceased at scene after reportedly being struck by a vehicle. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD West Traffic (Incident #3394).; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; E226 EM1 RA26 T26; CH4; 10; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#1130; 04:47PM; 8700 N Valley Circle Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cScJk7; Chatsworth; LAFD ground and air response to a teenage mountain bicyclist on a remote trail in the Simi Hills near Woolsey Canyon, who sustained an apparent arm fracture in a fall. He will be hoisted into a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter for inflight care during direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC17 E106 E296 E90 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 RA106 RH114 T96; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0334; 07:50AM; 3866 W Boyce Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rbkpq5; Atwater Village; 33 Firefighters took just 20 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames within a 2,785 square-foot 2 story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC2 BC5 E220 E227 E250 E55 E56 RA56 RA835 T20 T27; CH9; 14; Brian Humphrey
